001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Decorator;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.HyperparameterConfigurable;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
010
011import java.util.HashMap;
012import java.util.Map;
013import java.util.Objects;
014
015/**
016 * An abstract {@link Regime} implementation that delegates all training
017 * to another {@link Regime}.
018 *
019 * <p>This class provides the common base for regime decorators such as
020 * {@code BatchRegime}, {@code OnlineRegime}, or reporting regimes.
021 * Subclasses can override {@link #train} to add cross-cutting behavior
022 * (logging, early stopping, etc.) while still forwarding the actual
023 * training call to the delegated regime.</p>
024 *
025 * <h3>Default behavior</h3>
026 * <ul>
027 *   <li>If a delegate regime is provided in the constructor, all calls are
028 *   forwarded to it.</li>
029 *   <li>If no delegate is provided ({@code null}), a default inline regime is
030 *   created that simply invokes
031 *   {@link Optimizer#optimize(EstimationFunction, DataSet, ObjectiveFunction)}
032 *   once on the entire dataset, i.e. a <em>single batch update</em>.</li>
033 * </ul>
034 */
035@Decorator
036public abstract class DelegatedRegime implements Regime, HyperparameterConfigurable {
037
038    private final Map<String, Object> hyperparameters = new HashMap<>();
039
040    /**
041     * The regime that receives all delegated training calls.
042     * Guaranteed to be non-null: if no delegate is provided,
043     * a default batch regime is created internally.
044     */
045    protected final Regime regime;
046
047    /**
048     * Creates a new delegated regime.
049     *
050     * @param regime the regime to delegate to; if {@code null},
051     *               a default regime is used that trains once on the
052     *               full dataset via the given {@link Optimizer}.
053     */
054    protected DelegatedRegime(Regime regime) {
055        this.regime = Objects.requireNonNull(regime);
056    }
057
058    /**
059     * Returns the underlying delegated regime.
060     *
061     * @return the non-null delegate regime, either the one passed in the
062     * constructor or the default batch regime
063     */
064    public Regime getDelegatedRegime() {
065        return regime;
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * {@inheritDoc}
070     */
071    @Override
072    public boolean hasHyperparameter(String name) {
073        return hyperparameters.containsKey(name) || regime instanceof HyperparameterConfigurable configurable && configurable.hasHyperparameter(name);
074    }
075
076    /**
077     * {@inheritDoc}
078     */
079    @Override
080    public Map<String, Object> getHyperparameters() {
081        return hyperparameters;
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * {@inheritDoc}
086     */
087    @Override
088    public void setHyperparameter(String name, Object value) {
089        if (!hyperparameters.containsKey(name) && regime instanceof HyperparameterConfigurable configurable && configurable.hasHyperparameter(name)) {
090            configurable.setHyperparameter(name, value);
091        } else {
092            hyperparameters.put(name, value);
093        }
094    }
095}
